bug.author: hoytak
bug.summary: protocols in urls are not case insensitive.
bug.description: Protocols are case insensitive according to the spec (<denchmark-link:https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-3.1>https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-3.1</denchmark-link> ). It looks like the case insensitivity is handled properly in the get_protocol function above, but most matching of protocols does not go through this function and hence are not actually case insensitive.
